name: Block Blast 3D!
description:
A simple & addictive puzzle game.

HOW TO PLAY
- Just tap to place the blocks into the box. Three same blocks will be collected. Collect all the blocks as fast as possible.
- When all blocks are collected, you win!
- When there are 7 blocks on the box, you fail!
- If you accumulate all the energy, lightning will wipe out all the blocks in the box.

Use your brain and take part in challenges! Let’s see which level you can reach!

If you have any questions or concerns, please contact us: service@m.teewee.games
